english.segment1: Through me the way to the city of dolent. Through me the way to eternal dole. Through me the way among people lost
english.segment2: Justice incited my sublime Creator;. Created me divine Omnipotence;. The highest Wisdom, and the primal Love;
english.segment3: Before me there were no created things, Only eterne, and I eternal last, All hope abandon, ye who enter in!
english.segment4: These people have not any hope of death
